short_summary: Solicitation amend 002 is raised to answer bidder's nuesions.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Solicitation amend 001 is raised to correct theurgaish title.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax as soon as possible.Item 1, GSIN: 4520, NSN: 4520-20-A0X-6934, Force Air HeaterPart No.: C300L-10.75-1NM, NCAGE: 17032Quantity: 12, Unit of Issue: 1. to be delivered to CFB Halifax.Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.This requirement included an option for an additional quantity of 40 to be exercised within 12 months from contract award. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
